shortDescription: Check in what cell X and Y lands on for a rectangular grid.

arguments.name: rectGrid
arguments.description: Contains in order: Grid X, GridY (top-left corner of the grid), Grid width, Grid height, Number of cells in width, Number of cells in height.

returns.name: cellX
returns.description: The cell X, or false if the coordinations don't land in the grid.

returns.name: cellY
returns.description: The cell Y, or false if the coordinations don't land in the grid.
